original_text: And thou shalt go to thy fathers in peace; thou shalt be buried in a good old age.
korean_text: 너는 장수하다가 평안히 조상에게로 돌아가 장사될 것이요

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt go to thy fathers in peace
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 평안히 너의 조상들에게 돌아가리라

sentences.original_text: thou shalt be buried in a good old age
